snippet: Judge Jon Belz of Sangamon County Circuit Court on Wednesday issued a stay on the state’s pension law until the court can rule on its constitutionality.
abstract: Judge Jon Belz of Sangamon County Circuit Court in Illinois issues stay on state's pension law until the court can rule on its constitutionality.
lead_paragraph: Judge Jon Belz of Sangamon County Circuit Court on Wednesday issued a stay on the state’s pension law until the court can rule on its constitutionality.
